questions.content:
A CloudOps engineer is examining the following AWS CloudFormation template:

Why will the stack creation fail?

options.label: A
options.content: The Outputs section of the CloudFormation template was omitted.

options.label: B
options.content: The Parameters section of the CloudFormation template was omitted.

options.label: C
options.content: The PrivateDnsName cannot be sot from a CloudFormation template.

options.label: D
options.content: The VPC was not specified in the CloudFormation template.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C：PrivateDnsName 是 EC2 实例的一个属性，不能通过 CloudFormation 模板直接设置。它由 AWS 自动分配给启用了 DNS 主机名的 VPC 中的实例。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: Outputs 部分是可选的，省略它不会导致堆栈创建失败。
  • B: Parameters 部分也是可选的，只有在模板引用参数但未定义时才会失败。
  • D: VPC 可以在模板中定义或通过默认 VPC 使用，不一定需要显式指定。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C：PrivateDnsName 是 EC2 实例的一个属性，不能通过 CloudFormation 模板直接设置。它由 AWS 自动分配给启用了 DNS 主机名的 VPC 中的实例。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: Outputs 部分是可选的，省略它不会导致堆栈创建失败。
  • B: Parameters 部分也是可选的，只有在模板引用参数但未定义时才会失败。
  • D: VPC 可以在模板中定义或通过默认 VPC 使用，不一定需要显式指定。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C: PrivateDnsName is an attribute of an EC2 instance that cannot be set directly through a CloudFormation template. It is automatically assigned by AWS to instances in VPCs with DNS hostnames enabled.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: The Outputs section is optional; omitting it will not cause stack creation to fail.
  • B: The Parameters section is also optional; it only fails when the template references undefined parameters.
  • D: VPC can be defined in the template or use the default VPC; it does not necessarily need to be explicitly specified.
explanations.ja:
正解 C：PrivateDnsNameはEC2インスタンスの属性であり、CloudFormationテンプレートで直接設定することはできません。これはDNSホスト名が有効なVPC内のインスタンスにAWSによって自動的に割り当てられます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: Outputsセクションはオプションであり、省略してもスタック作成は失敗しません。
  • B: Parametersセクションもオプションであり、テンプレートが未定義のパラメータを参照している場合のみ失敗します。
  • D: VPCはテンプレートで定義するか、デフォルトVPCを使用できます。明示的に指定する必要はありません。

questions.content: A company applies user-defined tags to resources that are associated with the company's AWS workloads. Twenty days after applying the tags, the company notices that it cannot use the tags to filter views in the AWS Cost Explorer console. What is the reason for this issue?

options.label: A
options.content: It takes at least 30 days to be able to use tags to filter views in Cost Explorer.

options.label: B
options.content: The company has not activated the user-defined tags for cost allocation.

options.label: C
options.content: The company has not created an AWS Cost and Usage Report.

options.label: D
options.content: The company has not created a usage budget in AWS Budgets.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B：要在 Cost Explorer 中使用标签筛选，必须先在 Billing and Cost Management 控制台中激活用户定义的成本分配标签。仅添加标签不会自动使其可用于成本分析。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 激活标签后，数据通常在 24 小时内可用，不需要 30 天。
  • C: Cost and Usage Report 用于导出详细成本数据，不是在 Cost Explorer 中使用标签的前提条件。
  • D: AWS Budgets 用于设置预算警报，与标签在 Cost Explorer 中的可用性无关。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B：要在 Cost Explorer 中使用标签筛选，必须先在 Billing and Cost Management 控制台中激活用户定义的成本分配标签。仅添加标签不会自动使其可用于成本分析。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 激活标签后，数据通常在 24 小时内可用，不需要 30 天。
  • C: Cost and Usage Report 用于导出详细成本数据，不是在 Cost Explorer 中使用标签的前提条件。
  • D: AWS Budgets 用于设置预算警报，与标签在 Cost Explorer 中的可用性无关。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B: To use tags for filtering in Cost Explorer, you must first activate user-defined cost allocation tags in the Billing and Cost Management console. Simply adding tags does not automatically make them available for cost analysis.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: After activating tags, data is typically available within 24 hours, not 30 days.
  • C: Cost and Usage Reports are for exporting detailed cost data; they are not a prerequisite for using tags in Cost Explorer.
  • D: AWS Budgets is for setting budget alerts and is unrelated to tag availability in Cost Explorer.
explanations.ja:
正解 B：Cost Explorerでタグによるフィルタリングを使用するには、まずBilling and Cost Management コンソールでユーザー定義のコスト配分タグを有効化する必要があります。タグを追加するだけでは、コスト分析で自動的に利用可能にはなりません。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: タグを有効化すると、通常24時間以内にデータが利用可能になります。30日は必要ありません。
  • C: Cost and Usage Reportは詳細なコストデータのエクスポート用であり、Cost Explorerでタグを使用するための前提条件ではありません。
  • D: AWS Budgetsは予算アラートの設定用であり、Cost Explorerでのタグの利用可能性とは関係ありません。

questions.content: An environment consists of 100 Amazon EC2 Windows instances. The Amazon CloudWatch agent is deployed and running on all EC2 instances with a baseline configuration file to capture log files. There is a new requirement to capture the DHCP log files that exist on 50 of the instances. What is the MOST operationally efficient way to meet this new requirement?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create an additional CloudWatch agent configuration filo to capture the DHCP logs. Use the AWS Systems Manager Run
Command to restart the CloudWatch agent on each EC2 instance with the append-config option to apply the additional
configuration file.

options.label: B
options.content:
Log in to each EC2 instance with administrator rights. Create a PowerShell script to push the needed baseline log files and
DHCP log files to CloudWatch.

options.label: C
options.content:
Run the CloudWatch agent configuration file wizard on each EC2 instance. Verify that the baseline log files are included and
add the DHCP log files during the wizard creation process.

options.label: D
options.content:
Run the CloudWatch agent configuration file wizard on each EC2 instance and select the advanced detail level. This will
capture the operating system log files.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：Systems Manager Run Command 配合 append-config 选项是最高效的方法。它允许在不覆盖现有配置的情况下添加新的日志收集配置，并可以批量操作多个实例。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 手动登录每个实例操作效率极低，且 PowerShell 脚本的管理和维护也更复杂。
  • C: 在每个实例上运行配置向导需要手动交互，无法自动化，效率很低。
  • D: 选择"高级详细级别"不能保证捕获特定的 DHCP 日志文件。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：Systems Manager Run Command 配合 append-config 选项是最高效的方法。它允许在不覆盖现有配置的情况下添加新的日志收集配置，并可以批量操作多个实例。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 手动登录每个实例操作效率极低，且 PowerShell 脚本的管理和维护也更复杂。
  • C: 在每个实例上运行配置向导需要手动交互，无法自动化，效率很低。
  • D: 选择"高级详细级别"不能保证捕获特定的 DHCP 日志文件。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A: Systems Manager Run Command with the append-config option is the most efficient method. It allows adding new log collection configurations without overwriting existing ones and can batch operations across multiple instances.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: Manually logging into each instance is extremely inefficient, and managing PowerShell scripts is more complex.
  • C: Running the configuration wizard on each instance requires manual interaction and cannot be automated, making it very inefficient.
  • D: Selecting "advanced detail level" does not guarantee capturing specific DHCP log files.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：Systems Manager Run CommandとAPpend-configオプションの組み合わせが最も効率的な方法です。既存の設定を上書きせずに新しいログ収集設定を追加でき、複数のインスタンスに対して一括操作が可能です。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: 各インスタンスに手動でログインするのは非常に非効率的であり、PowerShellスクリプトの管理も複雑です。
  • C: 各インスタンスで設定ウィザードを実行するには手動の操作が必要で、自動化できないため非常に非効率的です。
  • D:「高度な詳細レベル」を選択しても、特定のDHCPログファイルのキャプチャは保証されません。

questions.content: A company is storing backups in an Amazon S3 bucket. The backups must not be deleted for at least 3 months after the backups are created. What should a CloudOps engineer do to meet this requirement?

options.label: A
options.content:
Configure an IAM policy that denies the s3:DeleteObject action for all users. Three months after an object is written, remove
the policy.

options.label: B
options.content:
Enable S3 Object Lock on a new S3 bucket in compliance mode. Place all backups in the new S3 bucket with a retention
period of 3 months.

options.label: C
options.content: Enable S3 Versioning on the existing S3 bucket. Configure S3 Lifecycle rules to protect the backups.

options.label: D
options.content:
Enable S3 Object Lock on a new S3 bucket in governance mode. Place all backups in the new S3 bucket with a retention
period of 3 months.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B：S3 Object Lock 的合规模式（Compliance Mode）提供最强的保护 - 在保留期内，任何人（包括 root 用户）都无法删除或覆盖对象。这确保了备份在 3 个月内不会被删除。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 手动管理 IAM 策略来跟踪每个对象的时间是不切实际的，且容易出错。
  • C: S3 Versioning 和 Lifecycle 规则不能阻止删除操作，只能管理版本和过期。
  • D: 治理模式（Governance Mode）允许具有特定权限的用户覆盖保护，不如合规模式严格。

questions.content: A company's CloudOps engineer is troubleshooting communication between the components of an application. The company configured VPC flow logs to be published to Amazon CloudWatch Logs However, there are no logs in CloudWatch Logs. What could be blocking the VPC flow logs from being published to CloudWatch Logs?

options.label: A
options.content: The IAM policy that is attached to the IAM role for the flow log is missing the logs:CreateLogGroup permission.

options.label: B
options.content: The IAM policy that is attached to the IAM role for the flow log is missing the logs:CreateExportTask permission.

options.label: C
options.content: The VPC is configured for IPv6 addresses.

options.label: D
options.content: The VPC is peered with another VPC in the AWS account

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：VPC Flow Logs 发布到 CloudWatch Logs 需要 IAM 角色具有 logs:CreateLogGroup 权限来创建日志组。缺少此权限会导致日志无法发布。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: logs:CreateExportTask 用于将日志导出到 S3，不是发布流日志所需的权限。
  • C: IPv6 配置与 VPC Flow Logs 的发布能力无关。
  • D: VPC 对等连接不会影响流日志的发布。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：VPC Flow Logs 发布到 CloudWatch Logs 需要 IAM 角色具有 logs:CreateLogGroup 权限来创建日志组。缺少此权限会导致日志无法发布。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: logs:CreateExportTask 用于将日志导出到 S3，不是发布流日志所需的权限。
  • C: IPv6 配置与 VPC Flow Logs 的发布能力无关。
  • D: VPC 对等连接不会影响流日志的发布。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer D: When an AWS Config rule returns COMPLIANT for a resource that the system previously recorded as NONCOMPLIANT, the remediation will not run automatically because no new compliance evaluation has triggered it.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: This is not related to Config rule evaluation frequency.
  • B: This has nothing to do with IAM permission issues.
  • C: The issue is not about SSM document configuration.
explanations.ja:
正解 D：AWS Config ルールが、以前NONCOMPLIANTとして記録されていたリソースに対してCOMPLIANTを返した場合、新しいコンプライアンス評価がトリガーされていないため、修復は自動的に実行されません。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: これはConfig ルールの評価頻度とは関係ありません。
  • B: これはIAM権限の問題とは関係ありません。
  • C: 問題はSSMドキュメントの設定についてではありません。

questions.content: A company is migrating a legacy application to AWS. The company manually installs and configures the legacy application on Amazon EC2 instances across multiple Availability Zones. The company sets up an Application Load Balancer (ALB) for the application. The company sets the target group routing algorithm to weighted random. The application requires session affinity. After the company deploys the application, users report random application errors that were not present in the legacy version of the application. The target group health checks do not show any failures. The company must resolve the application errors. Which solution will meet this requirement?

options.label: A
options.content: Set the routing algorithm of the target group to least outstanding requests.

options.label: B
options.content: Turn on anomaly mitigation for the target group.

options.label: C
options.content: Turn off the cross-zone load balancing attribute of the target group.

options.label: D
options.content: Increase the deregistration delay attribute of the target group.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：应用需要会话亲和性，但使用了 weighted random 算法，这会导致请求被随机分发到不同实例，破坏会话状态。Least Outstanding Requests 算法能更好地支持会话亲和性。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 异常缓解功能用于处理异常实例，不能解决会话亲和性问题。
  • C: 关闭跨区域负载均衡会影响流量分配，但不能解决会话亲和性问题。
  • D: 取消注册延迟与会话亲和性无关。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：应用需要会话亲和性，但使用了 weighted random 算法，这会导致请求被随机分发到不同实例，破坏会话状态。Least Outstanding Requests 算法能更好地支持会话亲和性。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 异常缓解功能用于处理异常实例，不能解决会话亲和性问题。
  • C: 关闭跨区域负载均衡会影响流量分配，但不能解决会话亲和性问题。
  • D: 取消注册延迟与会话亲和性无关。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B: Amazon EventBridge (CloudWatch Events) with AWS Lambda is the most efficient solution for automatic recovery. You can configure EventBridge to detect EC2 instance status check failures and trigger a Lambda function to perform instance recovery.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: CloudWatch Alarms with EC2 Auto Recovery actions are limited to specific recovery actions and may not provide the flexibility needed.
  • C: Manual monitoring and recovery is operationally inefficient.
  • D: Using SNS alone only provides notifications, not automatic recovery.
explanations.ja:
正解 B：Amazon EventBridge（CloudWatch Events）とAWS Lambdaの組み合わせが自動復旧のための最も効率的なソリューションです。EventBridgeを設定してEC2インスタンスのステータスチェック失敗を検出し、Lambda関数をトリガーしてインスタンスの復旧を実行できます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: CloudWatchアラームとEC2自動復旧アクションは特定の復旧アクションに限定されており、必要な柔軟性が得られない場合があります。
  • C: 手動の監視と復旧は運用上非効率的です。
  • D: SNSのみを使用すると通知のみが提供され、自動復旧は行われません。

questions.content: A company is using an Amazon Aurora MySQL DB cluster that has point-in-time recovery, backtracking, and automatic backup enabled. A CloudOps engineer needs to be able to roll back the DB cluster to a specific recovery point within the previous 72 hours. Restores must be completed in the same production DB cluster. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content: Create an Aurora Replica. Promote the replica to replace the primary DB instance.

options.label: B
options.content: Create an AWS Lambda function to restore an automatic backup to the existing DB cluster.

options.label: C

options.label: D

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer is troubleshooting an AWS CloudFormation stack creation that failed. Before the CloudOps engineer can identify the problem, the stack and its resources are deleted. For future deployments, the CloudOps engineer must preserve any resources that CloudFormation successfully created. What should the CloudOps engineer do to meet this requirement?

options.label: A
options.content: Set the value of the DisableRollback parameter to False during stack creation.

options.label: B
options.content: Set the value of the OnFailure parameter to DO_NOTHING during stack creation.

options.label: C
options.content: Specify a rollback configuration that has a rollback trigger of DO_NOTHING during stack creation

options.label: D
options.content: Set the value of the OnFailure parameter to ROLLBACK during stack creation.

questions.explanation:

  • C: 没有 DO_NOTHING 这样的回滚触发器配置选项。
  • D: OnFailure 设置为 ROLLBACK 会在失败时删除所有资源（默认行为）。

questions.content: A company plans to run a public web application on Amazon EC2 instances behind an Elastic Load Balancing (ELB) load balancer. The company’s security team wants to protect the website by using AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) certificates. The load balancer must automatically redirect any HTTP requests to HTTPS. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create an Application Load Balancer that has one HTTPS listener on port 80. Attach an SSL/TLS certificate to listener port 80.
Create a rule to redirect requests from HTTP to HTTPS.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create an Application Load Balancer that has one HTTP listener on port 80 and one HTTPS protocol listener on port 443.
Attach an SSL/TLS certificate to listener port 443. Create a rule to redirect requests from port 80 to port 443.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create an Application Load Balancer that has two TCP listeners on port 80 and port 443. Attach an SSL/TLS certificate to
listener port 443. Create a rule to redirect requests from port 80 to port 443.

options.label: D
options.content:
Create a Network Load Balancer that has two TCP listeners on port 80 and port 443. Attach an SSL/TLS certificate to listener
port 443. Create a rule to redirect requests from port 80 to port 443.

questions.explanation:

questions.content: A company uses AWS Organizations to manage a set of AWS accounts. The company has set up organizational units (OUs) in the organization. An application OU supports various applications. A CloudOps engineer must prevent users from launching Amazon EC2 instances that do not have a CostCenter-Project tag into any account in the application OU. The restriction must apply only to accounts in the application OU. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create an IAM group that has a policy that allows the ec2:RunInstances action when the CostCenter-Project tag is present.
Place all IAM users who need access to the application accounts in the IAM group.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create a service control policy (SCP) that denies the oc2:RunInstances action when the CostCenter-Project tag is missing.
Attach the SCP to the application OU.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create an IAM role that has a policy that allows the oc2:RunInstances action when the CostCenter-Project tag is present.
Attach the IAM role to the IAM users that are in the application OU accounts.

options.label: D
options.content:
Create a service control policy (SCP) that denies the ec2:RunInstances action when the CostCenter-Project tag is missing.
Attach the SCP to the root OU.

questions.explanation:

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: IAM 组只在单个账户内有效，无法跨多个账户应用。
  • C: IAM 角色需要在每个账户中单独创建和管理，管理开销大。
  • D: 附加到根 OU 会影响组织中的所有账户，而不仅仅是应用 OU。

explanations.ja:

  • B: AWS Configルールは非準拠を検出できますが、タグ付けされていないリソースの作成を防ぐことはできません。

questions.content: A company runs a business application on more than 300 Linux-based instances. Each instance has the AWS Systems Manager Agent (SSM Agent) installed. The company expects the number of instances to grow in the future. All business application instances have the same user-defined tag. A CloudOps engineer wants to run a command on all the business application instances to download and install a package from a private repository. To avoid overwhelming the repository, the CloudOps engineer wants to ensure that no more than 30 downloads occur at one time. Which solution will meet this requirement in the MOST operationally efficient way?

options.label: A
options.content:
Use a secondary tag to create 10 batches of 30 instances each. Use a Systems Manager Run Command document to
download and install the package. Specify the target as part of the Run
Command document by using the secondary tag. Run each batch one time.

options.label: B
options.content:
Use an AWS Lambda function to automatically run a Systems Manager Run Command document that roads a list of instance
IDs that have the user-defined tag. Set reserved concurrency for the Lambda function to 30.

options.label: C
options.content:
Use a Systems Manager Run Command document to download and install the package. Use rate control to set concurrency
to 30. Specify the target by using the user-defined tag as part of the Run Command document.

options.label: D
options.content:
Use a parallel workflow state in AWS Step Functions to automatically run a Systems Manager Run Command document that
reads a list of instance IDs that have the user-defined tag. Set the number of parallel states to 30. Run the Step Functions
workflow 10 times.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C：Systems Manager Run Command 的速率控制功能可以限制并发执行次数为 30，并通过标签精确定位目标实例。这是最高效的自动化解决方案。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 创建额外的标签和手动分批执行增加了复杂性和操作开销。
  • B: Lambda 的保留并发控制的是函数本身，不是 Run Command 的并发。
  • D: Step Functions 并行状态的配置更复杂，且需要手动运行多次。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C：Systems Manager Run Command 的速率控制功能可以限制并发执行次数为 30，并通过标签精确定位目标实例。这是最高效的自动化解决方案。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 创建额外的标签和手动分批执行增加了复杂性和操作开销。
  • B: Lambda 的保留并发控制的是函数本身，不是 Run Command 的并发。
  • D: Step Functions 并行状态的配置更复杂，且需要手动运行多次。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C: Systems Manager Run Command's rate control feature can limit concurrent executions to 30 and precisely target instances using tags. This is the most efficient automated solution.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Creating additional tags and manual batch execution adds complexity and operational overhead.
  • B: Lambda's reserved concurrency controls the function itself, not Run Command's concurrency.
  • D: Step Functions parallel state configuration is more complex and requires multiple manual runs.
explanations.ja:
正解 C：Systems Manager Run Command のレート制御機能は、並行実行を30に制限し、タグを使用してインスタンスを正確にターゲットできます。これは最も効率的な自動化ソリューションです。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: 追加のタグを作成し、手動でバッチ実行すると、複雑さと運用オーバーヘッドが増加します。
  • B: Lambda の予約済み同時実行は、Run Command の同時実行ではなく、関数自体を制御します。
  • D: Step Functions の並列状態の設定はより複雑で、複数回の手動実行が必要です。

questions.content: A company uses Amazon Route 53 with latency-based routing across multiple AWS Regions to provide resiliency. The company uses Route 53 with latency-based routing to direct traffic to the nearest Region. Within each Region, weighted A records distribute traffic across multiple Availability Zones. During a recent update, some Availability Zone endpoints became unhealthy. Route 53 continued to route traffic to the unhealthy endpoints. The company must prevent this issue from occurring in the future. Which solution will meet this requirement?

options.label: A
options.content: Add a Route 53 health check for each of the weighted records that received traffic during the recent update.

options.label: B
options.content: Increase the weight of Route 53 records in the Region where traffic must go during updates.

options.label: C
options.content: Reconfigure all records to use latency-based routing across all Regions uniformly.

options.label: D
options.content: Reduce the TTL value for latency-based routing to detect changes more quickly.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：Route 53 健康检查可以监控端点的可用性。为每个加权记录添加健康检查后，Route 53 会自动停止将流量路由到不健康的端点。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 增加特定区域的权重不能自动检测和避免不健康的端点。
  • C: 重新配置为基于延迟的路由不能解决端点健康检查问题。
  • D: 降低 TTL 只能更快地传播 DNS 更改，但不能检测不健康的端点。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：Route 53 健康检查可以监控端点的可用性。为每个加权记录添加健康检查后，Route 53 会自动停止将流量路由到不健康的端点。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 增加特定区域的权重不能自动检测和避免不健康的端点。
  • C: 重新配置为基于延迟的路由不能解决端点健康检查问题。
  • D: 降低 TTL 只能更快地传播 DNS 更改，但不能检测不健康的端点。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A: Route 53 health checks can monitor endpoint availability. After adding health checks to each weighted record, Route 53 will automatically stop routing traffic to unhealthy endpoints.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: Increasing weight for specific regions cannot automatically detect and avoid unhealthy endpoints.
  • C: Reconfiguring to latency-based routing doesn't solve endpoint health check issues.
  • D: Lowering TTL only propagates DNS changes faster but cannot detect unhealthy endpoints.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：Route 53 ヘルスチェックはエンドポイントの可用性を監視できます。各加重レコードにヘルスチェックを追加すると、Route 53 は不健全なエンドポイントへのトラフィックルーティングを自動的に停止します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: 特定のリージョンの重みを増やしても、不健全なエンドポイントを自動的に検出して回避することはできません。
  • C: レイテンシベースのルーティングに再設定しても、エンドポイントのヘルスチェックの問題は解決しません。
  • D: TTL を下げると DNS の変更がより速く伝播されますが、不健全なエンドポイントを検出することはできません。

questions.content: A company must ensure that all Amazon EC2 Windows instances that are launched in an AWS account have a third-party agent installed. The company uses AWS Systems Manager, and the Windows instances are tagged appropriately. The company must deploy periodic updates to the third-party agent when the updates become available. Which combination of steps will meet these requirements with the LEAST operational effort? (Choose two.)

options.label: A
options.content: Create a Systems Manager Distributor package for the third-party agent.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create a Systems Manager OpsItem that includes the tag value for Windows. Attach the Systems Manager inventory to the
OpsItem.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create an AWS Lambda function. Program the Lambda function to log in to each instance and to install or update the third-
party agent as needed.

options.label: D
options.content:
Create a Systems Manager State Manager association to run the AWS-RunRemoteScript document Populate the details of
the third-party agent package.

options.label: E
options.content:
Create a Systems Manager State Manager association to run the AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage document. Populate the
details of the third-party agent package. Specify instance tags based on the appropriate tag value for Windows.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A 和 E：创建 Distributor 包来打包第三方代理，然后使用 State Manager 关联运行 AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage 文档来自动安装和更新包，这是最少操作开销的组合。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: OpsItem 用于事件管理，不用于软件部署。
  • C: 使用 Lambda 登录实例不是最佳实践，且难以管理。
  • D: AWS-RunRemoteScript 不如 AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage 专门用于包管理。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A 和 E：创建 Distributor 包来打包第三方代理，然后使用 State Manager 关联运行 AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage 文档来自动安装和更新包，这是最少操作开销的组合。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: OpsItem 用于事件管理，不用于软件部署。
  • C: 使用 Lambda 登录实例不是最佳实践，且难以管理。
  • D: AWS-RunRemoteScript 不如 AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage 专门用于包管理。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A and E: Creating a Distributor package to package the third-party agent, then using State Manager association to run the AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage document to automatically install and update packages is the combination with least operational overhead.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: OpsItem is for event management, not software deployment.
  • C: Using Lambda to log into instances is not best practice and difficult to manage.
  • D: AWS-RunRemoteScript is not as specialized for package management as AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage.
explanations.ja:
正解 A と E：Distributor パッケージを作成してサードパーティエージェントをパッケージ化し、State Manager アソシエーションを使用して AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage ドキュメントを実行してパッケージを自動的にインストールおよび更新することが、最も運用オーバーヘッドの少ない組み合わせです。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: OpsItem はイベント管理用であり、ソフトウェアデプロイ用ではありません。
  • C: Lambda を使用してインスタンスにログインするのはベストプラクティスではなく、管理が困難です。
  • D: AWS-RunRemoteScript は、AWS-ConfigureAWSPackage ほどパッケージ管理に特化していません。

questions.content: A company has deployed Amazon EC2 instances from custom Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) in two AWS Regions. The company registered all the instances with AWS Systems Manager. The company discovers that the operating system on some instances has a significant zero-day exploit. However, the company does not know how many instances are affected. A CloudOps engineer must implement a solution to deploy operating system patches for the affected EC2 instances. Which solution will meet this requirement with the LEAST operational overhead?

options.label: A
options.content:
Define a patch baseline in Systems Manager Patch Manager. Use a Patch Manager scan to identify the affected instances.
Use the Patch Now option in each Region to update the affected instances.

options.label: B
options.content:
Use AWS Config to identify the affected instances. Define a patch baseline in Systems Manager Patch Manager. Use the
Patch Now option in Patch Manager to update the affected instances.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create an Amazon EventBridge rule to react to Systems Manager Compliance events. Configure the EventBridge rule to run
a patch baseline on the affected instances.

options.label: D
options.content:
Use AWS Config to identify the affected instances. Update the existing EC2 AMIs with the desired patch Manually launch
instances from the new AMIs to replace the affected instances in both Regions.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：Patch Manager 可以定义补丁基线，使用扫描功能识别受影响的实例，然后使用 Patch Now 选项在每个区域快速部署补丁。这提供了最低的操作开销。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: AWS Config 不能直接识别需要特定补丁的实例。
  • C: EventBridge 规则响应合规事件会增加复杂性。
  • D: 手动启动新实例替换旧实例是最高操作开销的方法。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：Patch Manager 可以定义补丁基线，使用扫描功能识别受影响的实例，然后使用 Patch Now 选项在每个区域快速部署补丁。这提供了最低的操作开销。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: AWS Config 不能直接识别需要特定补丁的实例。
  • C: EventBridge 规则响应合规事件会增加复杂性。
  • D: 手动启动新实例替换旧实例是最高操作开销的方法。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A: Patch Manager can define patch baselines, use the scan feature to identify affected instances, then use the Patch Now option to quickly deploy patches in each region. This provides the lowest operational overhead.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: AWS Config cannot directly identify instances that need specific patches.
  • C: EventBridge rules responding to compliance events adds complexity.
  • D: Manually launching new instances to replace old ones has the highest operational overhead.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：Patch Manager はパッチベースラインを定義し、スキャン機能を使用して影響を受けるインスタンスを特定し、Patch Now オプションを使用して各リージョンでパッチを迅速にデプロイできます。これにより、運用オーバーヘッドが最小限に抑えられます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: AWS Config は特定のパッチが必要なインスタンスを直接識別できません。
  • C: コンプライアンスイベントに応答する EventBridge ルールは複雑さを増します。
  • D: 古いインスタンスを置き換えるために新しいインスタンスを手動で起動することは、最も高い運用オーバーヘッドを伴います。

questions.content: A company hosts an FTP server on Amazon EC2 instances. In the company’s AWS environment, AWS Security Hub sends findings for the EC2 instances to Amazon EventBridge because the FTP port has become publicly exposed in the security groups that are attached to the instances. A CloudOps engineer wants an automated solution to remediate the Security Hub finding and any similar exposed port findings. The CloudOps engineer wants to use an event-driven approach. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content: Configure the existing EventBridge event to stop the EC2 instances that have the exposed port.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create a cron job for the FTP server to invoke an AWS Lambda function. Configure the Lambda function to modify the
security group of the identified EC2 instances and to remove the instances that allow public access.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create a cron job for the FTP server that invokes an AWS Lambda function. Configure the Lambda function to modify the
server to use SFTP instead of FTP.

options.label: D
options.content:
Configure the existing EventBridge event to invoke an AWS Lambda function. Configure the function to remove the security
group rule that allows public access.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 D：配置 EventBridge 事件触发 Lambda 函数，让函数自动修改安全组移除公开访问规则，这是事件驱动且自动化的解决方案。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 停止实例不能修复安全组问题，且会影响服务可用性。
  • B: cron 作业不是事件驱动的方法，且移除实例而非修复规则不恰当。
  • C: 修改为 SFTP 不能修复安全组暴露问题。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 D：配置 EventBridge 事件触发 Lambda 函数，让函数自动修改安全组移除公开访问规则，这是事件驱动且自动化的解决方案。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 停止实例不能修复安全组问题，且会影响服务可用性。
  • B: cron 作业不是事件驱动的方法，且移除实例而非修复规则不恰当。
  • C: 修改为 SFTP 不能修复安全组暴露问题。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer D: Configuring EventBridge events to trigger a Lambda function that automatically modifies security groups to remove public access rules is an event-driven and automated solution.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Stopping instances doesn't fix security group issues and affects service availability.
  • B: Cron jobs are not event-driven, and removing instances rather than fixing rules is inappropriate.
  • C: Changing to SFTP doesn't fix security group exposure issues.
explanations.ja:
正解 D：EventBridge イベントを設定して Lambda 関数をトリガーし、セキュリティグループを自動的に変更してパブリックアクセスルールを削除することは、イベント駆動型の自動化ソリューションです。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: インスタンスを停止してもセキュリティグループの問題は修正されず、サービスの可用性に影響します。
  • B: cron ジョブはイベント駆動型ではなく、ルールを修正するのではなくインスタンスを削除するのは適切ではありません。

questions.content: A company plans to migrate several of its high performance computing (HPC) virtual machines (VMs) to Amazon EC2 instances on AWS. A CloudOps engineer must identify a placement group for this deployment. The strategy must minimize network latency and must maximize network throughput between the HPC VMs. Which strategy should the CloudOps engineer choose to meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content: Deploy the instances in a cluster placement group in one Availability Zone.

options.label: B
options.content: Deploy the instances in a partition placement group in two Availability Zones.

options.label: C
options.content: Deploy the instances in a partition placement group in one Availability Zone.

options.label: D
options.content: Deploy the instances in a spread placement group in two Availability Zones.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：集群放置组（Cluster Placement Group）将实例放置在同一可用区的紧密网络中，提供最低的网络延迟和最高的吞吐量，非常适合 HPC 工作负载。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 分区放置组用于分布式工作负载，跨可用区会增加延迟。
  • C: 分区放置组设计用于减少相关故障，不是优化网络性能。
  • D: 分布放置组将实例分散在不同硬件上，会增加网络延迟。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：集群放置组（Cluster Placement Group）将实例放置在同一可用区的紧密网络中，提供最低的网络延迟和最高的吞吐量，非常适合 HPC 工作负载。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 分区放置组用于分布式工作负载，跨可用区会增加延迟。
  • C: 分区放置组设计用于减少相关故障，不是优化网络性能。
  • D: 分布放置组将实例分散在不同硬件上，会增加网络延迟。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A: Cluster Placement Groups place instances in a tightly coupled network within the same Availability Zone, providing the lowest network latency and highest throughput, ideal for HPC workloads.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: Partition placement groups are for distributed workloads; cross-AZ increases latency.
  • C: Partition placement groups are designed to reduce correlated failures, not optimize network performance.
  • D: Spread placement groups distribute instances across different hardware, increasing network latency.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：クラスタープレイスメントグループは、同じアベイラビリティゾーン内の密結合ネットワークにインスタンスを配置し、最低のネットワークレイテンシと最高のスループットを提供します。HPC ワークロードに最適です。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: パーティションプレイスメントグループは分散ワークロード用であり、AZ 間ではレイテンシが増加します。
  • C: パーティションプレイスメントグループは相関障害を減らすように設計されており、ネットワークパフォーマンスの最適化用ではありません。
  • D: スプレッドプレイスメントグループは異なるハードウェア間でインスタンスを分散させ、ネットワークレイテンシが増加します。

questions.content: A company manages a set of accounts on AWS by using AWS Organizations. The company's security team wants to use a native AWS service to regularly scan all AWS accounts against the Center for Internet Security (CIS) AWS Foundations Benchmark. What is the MOST operationally efficient way to meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Designate a central security account as the AWS Security Hub administrator account. Create a script that sends an invitation
from the Security Hub administrator account and accepts the invitation from the member account. Run the script every time a
new account is created. Configure Security Hub to run the CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark scans.

options.label: B
options.content: Run the CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark across all accounts by using Amazon Inspector.

options.label: C
options.content:
Designate a central security account as the Amazon GuardDuty administrator account. Create a script that sends an
invitation from the GuardDuty administrator account and accepts the invitation from the member account. Run the script every
time a new account is created. Configure GuardDuty to run the CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark scans.

options.label: D
options.content:
Designate an AWS Security Hub administrator account. Configure new accounts in the organization to automatically
become member accounts. Enable CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark scans.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 D：将 Security Hub 指定为管理员账户并配置组织自动加入成员账户，这是最高效的方法。新账户会自动成为成员，无需手动配置脚本。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 创建脚本手动发送和接受邀请比使用组织集成更麻烦。
  • B: Amazon Inspector 不支持 CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark。
  • C: GuardDuty 是威胁检测服务，不运行 CIS 基准扫描。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 D：将 Security Hub 指定为管理员账户并配置组织自动加入成员账户，这是最高效的方法。新账户会自动成为成员，无需手动配置脚本。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 创建脚本手动发送和接受邀请比使用组织集成更麻烦。
  • B: Amazon Inspector 不支持 CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark。
  • C: GuardDuty 是威胁检测服务，不运行 CIS 基准扫描。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer D: Designating Security Hub as the administrator account and configuring the organization to automatically enroll member accounts is the most efficient method. New accounts automatically become members without manual script configuration.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Creating scripts to manually send and accept invitations is more cumbersome than using organization integration.
  • B: Amazon Inspector does not support CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark.
  • C: GuardDuty is a threat detection service and does not run CIS benchmark scans.
explanations.ja:
正解 D：Security Hub を管理者アカウントとして指定し、組織がメンバーアカウントを自動的に登録するように設定することが最も効率的な方法です。新しいアカウントは手動スクリプト設定なしで自動的にメンバーになります。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: 手動で招待を送信および承諾するスクリプトを作成することは、組織統合を使用するよりも面倒です。
  • B: Amazon Inspector は CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark をサポートしていません。
  • C: GuardDuty は脅威検出サービスであり、CIS ベンチマークスキャンを実行しません。

questions.content: A company has users that deploy Amazon EC2 instances that have more volume performance capacity than is required. A CloudOps engineer needs to review all Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes that are associated with the instances and create cost optimization recommendations based on IOPS and throughput. What should the CloudOps engineer do to meet these requirements in the MOST operationally efficient way?

options.label: A
options.content:
Use the monitoring graphs in the EC2 console to view metrics for EBS volumes. Review the consumed space against the
provisioned space on each volume. Identify any volumes that have low utilization.

options.label: B
options.content:
Stop the EC2 instances from the EC2 console. Change the EC2 instance type to Amazon EBS-optimized. Start the EC2
instances.

options.label: C
options.content:
Opt in to AWS Compute Optimizer. Allow sufficient time for metrics to be gathered. Review the Compute Optimizer findings
for EBS volumes.

options.label: D
options.content:
Install the fio tool onto the EC2 instances and create a .cfg file to approximate the required workloads. Use the benchmark
results to gauge whether the provisioned EBS volumes are of the most appropriate type.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C：AWS Compute Optimizer 可以自动分析 EBS 卷的性能指标（包括 IOPS 和吞吐量），并提供优化建议。这是最高效的方法。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: EC2 控制台的监控图表不提供 EBS 性能优化建议。
  • B: 更改实例类型不能直接优化 EBS 卷性能。
  • D: 使用 fio 工具手动基准测试效率很低。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C：AWS Compute Optimizer 可以自动分析 EBS 卷的性能指标（包括 IOPS 和吞吐量），并提供优化建议。这是最高效的方法。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: EC2 控制台的监控图表不提供 EBS 性能优化建议。
  • B: 更改实例类型不能直接优化 EBS 卷性能。
  • D: 使用 fio 工具手动基准测试效率很低。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C: AWS Compute Optimizer can automatically analyze EBS volume performance metrics (including IOPS and throughput) and provide optimization recommendations. This is the most efficient method.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: EC2 console monitoring graphs do not provide EBS performance optimization recommendations.
  • B: Changing instance types cannot directly optimize EBS volume performance.
  • D: Manual benchmarking with fio tool is very inefficient.
explanations.ja:
正解 C：AWS Compute Optimizer は EBS ボリュームのパフォーマンスメトリクス（IOPS とスループットを含む）を自動的に分析し、最適化の推奨事項を提供できます。これは最も効率的な方法です。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: EC2 コンソールの監視グラフは EBS パフォーマンスの最適化に関する推奨事項を提供しません。
  • B: インスタンスタイプを変更しても、EBS ボリュームのパフォーマンスを直接最適化することはできません。
  • D: fio ツールによる手動ベンチマークは非常に非効率的です。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer must ensure that all of a company's current and future Amazon S3 buckets have logging enabled. If an S3 bucket does not have logging enabled, an automated process must enable logging for the S3 bucket. Which solution will meet these requirements?

questions.content: A company operates compute resources in a VPC and in the company’s on-premises data center. A CloudOps engineer needs to ensure that Amazon EC2 instances in the VPC can resolve DNS names for hosts in the on-premises data center. questions.content: A company hosts a web application on an Amazon EC2 instance. The web server logs are published to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The log events have the same structure and include the HTTP response codes that are associated with the user requests. questions.content: A company has an internal web application that runs on Amazon EC2 instances behind an Application Load Balancer. questions.content: A CloudOps engineer is creating a simple, public-facing website running on Amazon EC2. The CloudOps engineer created the EC2 instance in an existing public subnet and assigned an Elastic IP address to the instance. Next, the CloudOps engineer created and applied a new security group to the instance to allow incoming HTTP traffic from 0.0.0.0/0. Finally, the CloudOps engineer created a new network ACL and applied it to the subnet to allow incoming HTTP traffic from 0.0.0.0/0. However, the website cannot be reached from the internet. What is the cause of this issue?

options.label: A
options.content: The CloudOps engineer did not create an outbound rule that allows ephemeral port return traffic in the new network ACL

options.label: B
options.content: The CloudOps engineer did not create an outbound rule in the security group that allows HTTP traffic from port 80.

options.label: C

questions.content: A company wants to use AWS Systems Manager to manage a large fleet of Amazon EC2 instances. The company hosts the instances in private subnets. questions.content: A company has an application that collects notifications from thousands of alarm systems. The notifications include alarm notifications and information notifications. questions.content: A company has multiple AWS accounts. A CloudOps engineer uses a sandbox account to create and verify IAM policies for use in a production account. questions.content: A finance company stores confidential data in an Amazon S3 bucket. The company uses Amazon QuickSight to analyze the data and create dashboard reports.   • B: DLM 备份不能阻止堆栈删除时实例被删除。
  • C: AWS Backup 也不能阻止实例被删除。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B: AWS Resilience Hub helps you assess and improve the resilience of your applications. It provides recommendations based on your defined RTO and RPO objectives.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Well-Architected Tool provides general best practices, not specific resilience recommendations.
  • C: Trusted Advisor checks are more general and don't consider RTO/RPO.
  • D: Manual assessment is time-consuming and may miss issues.
explanations.ja:
正解 B：AWS Resilience Hub は、アプリケーションの回復力を評価および改善するのに役立ちます。定義された RTO と RPO の目標に基づいて推奨事項を提供します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: Well-Architected Tool は一般的なベストプラクティスを提供しますが、特定の回復力の推奨事項は提供しません。
  • C: Trusted Advisor のチェックはより一般的であり、RTO/RPO を考慮していません。
  • D: 手動評価は時間がかかり、問題を見逃す可能性があります。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer is preparing to deploy an application to Amazon EC2 instances that are in an Auto Scaling group. The application requires dependencies to be installed. Application updates are issued weekly. The CloudOps engineer needs to implement a solution to incorporate the application updates on a regular basis. The solution also must conduct a vulnerability scan during Amazon Machine Image (AMI) creation. What is the MOST operationally efficient solution that meets these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content: Create a script that uses Packer. Schedule a cron job to run the script.

options.label: B
options.content: Install the application and its dependencies on an EC2 instance. Create an AMI of the EC2 instance.

options.label: C
options.content: Use EC2 Image Builder with a custom recipe to install the application and its dependencies.

options.label: D
options.content: Invoke the EC2 CreateImage API operation by using an Amazon EventBridge scheduled rule.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C：EC2 Image Builder 支持创建自定义配方来安装应用和依赖，内置漏洞扫描功能，并可以按计划自动构建更新的 AMI。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: Packer 脚本需要额外管理，且不内置漏洞扫描。
  • B: 手动创建 AMI 不能自动化更新过程。
  • D: CreateImage API 不能安装依赖或进行漏洞扫描。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C：EC2 Image Builder 支持创建自定义配方来安装应用和依赖，内置漏洞扫描功能，并可以按计划自动构建更新的 AMI。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: Packer 脚本需要额外管理，且不内置漏洞扫描。
  • B: 手动创建 AMI 不能自动化更新过程。
  • D: CreateImage API 不能安装依赖或进行漏洞扫描。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A: AWS Transit Gateway connects VPCs and on-premises networks through a central hub. It simplifies network architecture and reduces operational overhead compared to VPC peering.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: VPC peering requires many connections and doesn't support transitive routing.
  • C: VPN connections directly to each VPC don't scale well.
  • D: AWS PrivateLink is for service endpoints, not general connectivity.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：AWS Transit Gateway は、中央ハブを介して VPC とオンプレミスネットワークを接続します。VPC ピアリングと比較して、ネットワークアーキテクチャを簡素化し、運用オーバーヘッドを削減します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: VPC ピアリングは多くの接続が必要で、推移的ルーティングをサポートしていません。
  • C: 各 VPC への直接 VPN 接続はスケーラブルではありません。
  • D: AWS PrivateLink はサービスエンドポイント用であり、一般的な接続用ではありません。

questions.content: A company is planning to host an application on a set of Amazon EC2 instances that are distributed across multiple Availability Zones. The application must be able to scale to millions of requests each second. A CloudOps engineer must design a solution to distribute the traffic to the EC2 instances. The solution must be optimized to handle sudden and volatile traffic patterns while using a single static IP address for each Availability Zone. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content: Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue

options.label: B
options.content: Application Load Balancer

options.label: C
options.content: AWS Global Accelerator

options.label: D
options.content: Network Load Balancer

questions.explanation:
正确答案 D：Network Load Balancer 可以为每个可用区分配静态 IP 地址，能够处理每秒数百万请求，并且针对突发流量模式进行了优化。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: SQS 队列不是负载均衡解决方案。
  • B: ALB 不支持静态 IP 地址。
  • C: Global Accelerator 提供静态 anycast IP，但不是每个可用区一个。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 D：Network Load Balancer 可以为每个可用区分配静态 IP 地址，能够处理每秒数百万请求，并且针对突发流量模式进行了优化。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: SQS 队列不是负载均衡解决方案。
  • B: ALB 不支持静态 IP 地址。
  • C: Global Accelerator 提供静态 anycast IP，但不是每个可用区一个。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C: AWS Network Firewall provides stateful inspection, intrusion prevention, and web filtering for VPC traffic. It can be deployed centrally in a Transit Gateway architecture.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Security groups don't provide IPS or domain filtering.
  • B: NACLs are stateless and don't have advanced filtering.
  • D: Third-party appliances require more management.
explanations.ja:
正解 C：AWS Network Firewall は、VPC トラフィックのステートフル検査、侵入防止、ウェブフィルタリングを提供します。Transit Gateway アーキテクチャで一元的にデプロイできます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: セキュリティグループは IPS やドメインフィルタリングを提供しません。
  • B: NACL はステートレスで、高度なフィルタリングがありません。
  • D: サードパーティアプライアンスはより多くの管理が必要です。

questions.content: A company has a stateful web application that is hosted on Amazon EC2 instances in an Auto Scaling group. The instances run behind an Application Load Balancer (ALB) that has a single target group. The ALB is configured as the origin in an Amazon CloudFront distribution. Users are reporting random logouts from the web application. Which combination of actions should a CloudOps engineer take to resolve this problem? (Choose two.)

options.label: A
options.content: Change to the least outstanding requests algorithm on the ALB target group,

options.label: B
options.content: Configure cookie forwarding in the CloudFront distribution cache behavior.

options.label: C
options.content: Configure header forwarding in the CloudFront distribution cache behavior.

options.label: D
options.content: Enable group-level stickiness on the ALB listener rule.

options.label: E
options.content: Enable sticky sessions on the ALB target group

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B 和 E：启用 ALB 目标组的粘性会话确保用户请求发送到同一实例，配置 CloudFront 转发 cookie 确保会话信息传递到 ALB。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 更改路由算法不能解决会话问题。
  • C: 头部转发与会话状态无关。
  • D: 监听器规则级别的粘性不存在。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B 和 E：启用 ALB 目标组的粘性会话确保用户请求发送到同一实例，配置 CloudFront 转发 cookie 确保会话信息传递到 ALB。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 更改路由算法不能解决会话问题。
  • C: 头部转发与会话状态无关。
  • D: 监听器规则级别的粘性不存在。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B: AWS Direct Connect provides dedicated, private connectivity from on-premises to AWS. Combined with VPN for encryption, it provides secure and consistent network performance.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: VPN alone over internet has variable latency and throughput.
  • C: Public internet is not secure or reliable for enterprise workloads.
  • D: Multiple VPNs don't improve consistency as much as Direct Connect.
explanations.ja:
正解 B：AWS Direct Connect は、オンプレミスから AWS への専用のプライベート接続を提供します。暗号化のための VPN と組み合わせると、安全で一貫したネットワークパフォーマンスを提供します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: インターネット経由の VPN のみでは、レイテンシとスループットが変動します。
  • C: パブリックインターネットは、エンタープライズワークロードにとって安全でも信頼性もありません。
  • D: 複数の VPN は、Direct Connect ほど一貫性を改善しません。

questions.content: A global company uses an organization in AWS Organizations to manage multiple AWS accounts. To comply with regulations, the company deploys workload environments to five AWS Regions. The company has a separate AWS account for each Region. The company needs to connect every environment's VPC to a central shared VPC that serves as a directory and to a shared monitoring VPC. The shared accounts are each in separate AWS accounts. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create a transit gateway in the central shared AWS account. Share the transit gateway with the company's AWS accounts.
Connect all VPCs to the central transit gateway.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create a separate transit gateway in every Region where the company has deployed resources. Share the transit gateways
with company's AWS accounts. Connect the VPC in each Region to the transit gateway that is in the same Region. Peer the
transit gateways. Create appropriate routes in all route tables.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create a virtual private gateway for the shared VPCs. Create a customer gateway for the workload VPCs. Configure an AWS
Site-to-Site VPN connection between the directory VPC, the monitoring VPC, and every workload VPC.

options.label: D
options.content: Create VPC peering connections between the central shared VPC, the shared monitoring VPC, and every workload VPC.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B：由于工作负载分布在 5 个区域，需要在每个区域创建 Transit Gateway 并进行跨区域对等连接。Transit Gateway 可以在区域内共享，连接各个 VPC。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 单个 Transit Gateway 不能跨多个区域工作。
  • C: Site-to-Site VPN 用于连接本地数据中心，不是 VPC 之间。
  • D: VPC 对等不能传递路由，管理复杂性高。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B：由于工作负载分布在 5 个区域，需要在每个区域创建 Transit Gateway 并进行跨区域对等连接。Transit Gateway 可以在区域内共享，连接各个 VPC。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 单个 Transit Gateway 不能跨多个区域工作。
  • C: Site-to-Site VPN 用于连接本地数据中心，不是 VPC 之间。
  • D: VPC 对等不能传递路由，管理复杂性高。

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: Network ACLs can't filter based on domain names.
  • C: Security groups don't filter DNS queries.
  • D: Third-party DNS servers require additional infrastructure.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：Amazon Route 53 Resolver DNS Firewall を使用すると、VPC からの送信 DNS クエリをフィルタリングできます。ドメインリストを作成して、悪意のあるドメインへのアクセスをブロックできます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: ネットワーク ACL はドメイン名に基づいてフィルタリングできません。
  • C: セキュリティグループは DNS クエリをフィルタリングしません。
  • D: サードパーティ DNS サーバーには追加のインフラストラクチャが必要です。

questions.content: A company stores critical information in an Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL database. The company notices degraded performance, high CPU utilization, increased query latency, and connection timeouts during peak shopping hours. The company also identifies surges in user connections during peak hours. The connection surges affect the read performance of the database. The company wants to resolve the database performance issues. Which combination of steps will meet this requirement? (Choose two.)

options.label: A
options.content:
Use Amazon RDS Performance Insights to analyze the SQL queries that most affect database performance. Update the SQL
queries based on the analysis findings.

options.label: B
options.content:
Use Amazon CloudWatch Logs Insights to analyze the database queries and identify performance bottlenecks. Update the
queries based on the analysis findings.

options.label: C
options.content: Use Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL with a single Availability Zone.

options.label: D
options.content: Disable connection pooling entirely to ensure that all user connections are treated equally, even during peak hours.

options.label: E
options.content: Implement RDS Proxy with connection pooling.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A 和 E：RDS Performance Insights 可以识别影响性能的 SQL 查询，RDS Proxy 提供连接池来处理连接激增，两者结合解决性能和连接问题。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: CloudWatch Logs Insights 不是分析数据库查询的工具。
  • C: 单可用区不能提高性能。
  • D: 禁用连接池会加剧连接问题。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A 和 E：RDS Performance Insights 可以识别影响性能的 SQL 查询，RDS Proxy 提供连接池来处理连接激增，两者结合解决性能和连接问题。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: CloudWatch Logs Insights 不是分析数据库查询的工具。
  • C: 单可用区不能提高性能。
  • D: 禁用连接池会加剧连接问题。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C: AWS Global Accelerator provides static IP addresses and routes traffic through AWS global network to optimal endpoints. It improves performance and availability for global applications.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: CloudFront is for content caching, not TCP/UDP application acceleration.
  • B: Route 53 latency routing doesn't provide static IPs or use AWS backbone.
  • D: Direct Connect is for dedicated connectivity, not global application acceleration.
explanations.ja:
正解 C：AWS Global Accelerator は静的 IP アドレスを提供し、AWS グローバルネットワークを介して最適なエンドポイントにトラフィックをルーティングします。グローバルアプリケーションのパフォーマンスと可用性を向上させます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: CloudFront はコンテンツキャッシング用であり、TCP/UDP アプリケーションアクセラレーション用ではありません。
  • B: Route 53 レイテンシルーティングは静的 IP を提供せず、AWS バックボーンを使用しません。
  • D: Direct Connect は専用接続用であり、グローバルアプリケーションアクセラレーション用ではありません。

questions.content: A company runs a web application on three Amazon EC2 instances behind an Application Load Balancer (ALB). The company notices that random periods of increased traffic cause a degradation in the application’s performance. A CloudOps engineer must scale the application to meet the increased traffic. Which solution meets these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm to monitor application latency and increase the size of each EC2 instance if the
desired threshold is reached.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create an Amazon EventBridge rule to monitor application latency and add an EC2 instance to the ALB if the desired
threshold is reached.

options.label: C
options.content:
Deploy the application to an Auto Scaling group of EC2 instances with a target tracking scaling policy. Attach the ALB to the
Auto Scaling group.

options.label: D
options.content:
Deploy the application to an Auto Scaling group of EC2 instances with a scheduled scaling policy. Attach the ALB to the
Auto Scaling group.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C：使用目标跟踪扩展策略的 Auto Scaling 组可以根据指标（如 CPU 使用率或请求数）自动调整容量，这是处理随机流量波动的最佳方案。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: CloudWatch 警报不能自动增加实例大小。
  • B: EventBridge 规则不能直接向 ALB 添加实例。
  • D: 计划扩展适用于可预测的流量，不适合随机流量。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C：使用目标跟踪扩展策略的 Auto Scaling 组可以根据指标（如 CPU 使用率或请求数）自动调整容量，这是处理随机流量波动的最佳方案。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: CloudWatch 警报不能自动增加实例大小。
  • B: EventBridge 规则不能直接向 ALB 添加实例。
  • D: 计划扩展适用于可预测的流量，不适合随机流量。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B: VPC endpoints (Gateway and Interface) allow private connectivity to AWS services without using public IPs or NAT gateways. This reduces data transfer costs and improves security.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: NAT Gateway incurs additional costs for data processing.
  • C: Internet Gateway exposes traffic to the public internet.
  • D: VPN connections are for on-premises connectivity.
explanations.ja:
正解 B：VPC エンドポイント（ゲートウェイとインターフェイス）を使用すると、パブリック IP や NAT ゲートウェイを使用せずに AWS サービスへのプライベート接続が可能になります。これにより、データ転送コストが削減され、セキュリティが向上します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: NAT Gateway はデータ処理に追加コストが発生します。
  • C: インターネットゲートウェイはトラフィックをパブリックインターネットに公開します。
  • D: VPN 接続はオンプレミス接続用です。

questions.content: A company’s reporting job that used to run in 15 minutes is now taking an hour to run. An application generates the reports. The application runs on Amazon EC2 instances and extracts data from an Amazon RDS for MySQL database. A CloudOps engineer checks the Amazon CloudWatch dashboard for the RDS instance and notices that the Read IOPS metrics are high, even when the reports are not running. The CloudOps engineer needs to improve the performance and the availability of the RDS instance. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Configure an Amazon ElastiCache cluster in front of the RDS instance. Update the reporting job to query the ElastiCache
cluster.

options.label: B
options.content: Deploy an RDS read replica. Update the reporting job to query the reader endpoint.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create an Amazon CloudFront distribution. Set the RDS instance as the origin. Update the reporting job to query the
CloudFront distribution.

options.label: D
options.content: Increase the size of the RDS instance.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B：RDS 读取副本可以分担读取流量，减轻主数据库的负载。报告作业是读取密集型的，应该从读取副本查询数据。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: ElastiCache 更适合频繁访问的数据缓存，不适合报告查询。
  • C: CloudFront 不能直接连接 RDS 数据库。
  • D: 增加实例大小成本更高，不如读取副本高效。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B：RDS 读取副本可以分担读取流量，减轻主数据库的负载。报告作业是读取密集型的，应该从读取副本查询数据。

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: X-Ray traces actual requests but doesn't proactively test endpoints.
  • C: Route 53 health checks only verify basic connectivity.
  • D: Third-party tools require additional setup and cost.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：Amazon CloudWatch Synthetics を使用すると、エンドポイントを継続的に監視するカナリアを作成できます。カナリアは API をテストし、コンテンツをチェックし、レイテンシを測定して、ユーザーに影響が出る前に問題を検出できます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: X-Ray は実際のリクエストをトレースしますが、エンドポイントを事前にテストしません。
  • C: Route 53 ヘルスチェックは基本的な接続性のみを検証します。
  • D: サードパーティツールは追加の設定とコストが必要です。

questions.content: A company that runs multiple workloads on AWS wants to enhance its security posture by implementing DNS-based threat protection. The company must block DNS-based attacks. Which solution will meet this requirement?

options.label: A
options.content: Deploy AWS Shield Advanced to filter and block malicious DNS queries. Set up domain filtering policies.

options.label: B
options.content: Use AWS WAF to inspect DNS traffic for malicious domains. Create custom rules to block known threats.

options.label: C
options.content:
Configure Amazon Route 53 Resolver to forward DNS queries to Route 53 Resolver DNS Firewall Advanced to detect and
filter threats.

options.label: D
options.content:
Configure AWS Config to monitor DNS queries and DNS traffic patterns. Use an AWS Lambda function to prevent access to
malicious domains.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C：Route 53 Resolver DNS Firewall 专门设计用于检测和过滤 DNS 级别的威胁，可以阻止对已知恶意域名的 DNS 查询。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: Shield Advanced 防护 DDoS 攻击，不是 DNS 威胁。
  • B: WAF 检查 HTTP/HTTPS 流量，不是 DNS 流量。
  • D: AWS Config 用于配置合规性，不是 DNS 威胁检测。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C：Route 53 Resolver DNS Firewall 专门设计用于检测和过滤 DNS 级别的威胁，可以阻止对已知恶意域名的 DNS 查询。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: Shield Advanced 防护 DDoS 攻击，不是 DNS 威胁。
  • B: WAF 检查 HTTP/HTTPS 流量，不是 DNS 流量。
  • D: AWS Config 用于配置合规性，不是 DNS 威胁检测。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C: AWS AppConfig allows you to deploy application configuration changes safely with validation and rollback capabilities. It integrates with Lambda, ECS, and EC2 applications.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Parameter Store doesn't have deployment validation or rollback.
  • B: Secrets Manager is for credentials, not general configuration.
  • D: Environment variables require redeployment to change.
explanations.ja:
正解 C：AWS AppConfig を使用すると、検証とロールバック機能を備えたアプリケーション設定変更を安全にデプロイできます。Lambda、ECS、EC2 アプリケーションと統合されています。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: Parameter Store にはデプロイ検証やロールバックがありません。
  • B: Secrets Manager は認証情報用であり、一般的な設定用ではありません。
  • D: 環境変数は変更に再デプロイが必要です。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer wants to share a copy of a production database with a migration account. The production database is hosted on an Amazon RDS DB instance and is encrypted at rest with an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that has an alias of production-rds-key. What must the CloudOps engineer do to meet these requirements with the LEAST administrative overhead?

options.label: A
options.content:

questions.content: A developer uses an Amazon Linux Amazon Machine Image (AMI) to launch an EC2 instance that hosts a third-party application. The application occasionally becomes unstable. The CloudOps engineer needs a solution to automatically reboot the EC2 instance whenever utilization is above 90% for 15 minutes and to notify the developer about the reboot. explanations.zh:

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 断开 VPC 连接会破坏与 RDS 的连接。

questions.content: A company's security policy requires incoming SSH traffic to be restricted to a defined set of addresses. The company is using an AWS Config rule to check whether security groups allow unrestricted incoming SSH traffic. A CloudOps engineer discovers a noncompliant resource and fixes the security group manually. The CloudOps engineer wants to automate the remediation of other noncompliant resources. What is the MOST operationally efficient solution that meets these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm for the AWS Config rule's status metric. Create an AWS Lambda function that can
remove the noncompliant rule from the security group. Configure the alarm action to invoke the Lambda function.

options.label: B
options.content:
Configure an automatic remediation action on the AWS Config rule. Specify the AWS-DisablolncomingSSHOnPort22
remediation action.

options.label: C
options.content:
Configure an Amazon EventBridge rule for AWS Config configuration item change events. Create an AWS Lambda function
that can remove the noncompliant rule from the security group
Configure the rule to invoke the Lambda function.

options.label: D
options.content:
Create an AWS Lambda function that can analyze a security group’s inbound rules to check for unrestricted SSH access.
Configure the Lambda function to remove the noncompliant rule from the security group. Configure an Amazon EventBridge
rule to invoke the Lambda function every hour.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B：AWS Config 支持自动修复操作，AWS-DisableIncomingSSHOnPort22 是预定义的修复动作，可以自动移除不合规的 SSH 规则。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: CloudWatch 警报方案更复杂。
  • C: EventBridge 方案需要编写 Lambda 代码。
  • D: 每小时检查不如实时修复高效。

explanations.zh:

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer is maintaining a web application using an Amazon CloudFront web distribution, an Application Load Balancer (ALB), Amazon RDS, and Amazon EC2 in a VPC. All services have logging enabled. The CloudOps engineer needs to investigate HTTP Layer 7 status codes from the web application. Which log sources contain the status codes? (Choose two.)

options.label: A
options.content: VPC Flow Logs

options.label: B
options.content: AWS CloudTrail logs

options.label: C
options.content: ALB access logs

options.label: D
options.content: CloudFront access logs

options.label: E
options.content: RDS logs

questions.explanation:
正确答案 C 和 D：HTTP Layer 7 状态码包含在 ALB 访问日志和 CloudFront 访问日志中，这两个日志记录 HTTP 请求和响应信息。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: VPC Flow Logs 只记录 Layer 3/4 信息，不包含 HTTP 状态码。
  • B: CloudTrail 记录 API 调用，不是 HTTP 流量。
  • E: RDS 日志记录数据库操作，不是 HTTP 状态码。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 C 和 D：HTTP Layer 7 状态码包含在 ALB 访问日志和 CloudFront 访问日志中，这两个日志记录 HTTP 请求和响应信息。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: VPC Flow Logs 只记录 Layer 3/4 信息，不包含 HTTP 状态码。
  • B: CloudTrail 记录 API 调用，不是 HTTP 流量。
  • E: RDS 日志记录数据库操作，不是 HTTP 状态码。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer C and D: HTTP Layer 7 status codes are included in ALB access logs and CloudFront access logs. These logs record HTTP request and response information.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: VPC Flow Logs only record Layer 3/4 information, not HTTP status codes.
  • B: CloudTrail records API calls, not HTTP traffic.
  • E: RDS logs record database operations, not HTTP status codes.
explanations.ja:
正解 C と D：HTTP レイヤー 7 ステータスコードは、ALB アクセスログと CloudFront アクセスログに含まれています。これらのログは HTTP リクエストとレスポンスの情報を記録します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: VPC Flow Logs はレイヤー 3/4 の情報のみを記録し、HTTP ステータスコードは記録しません。
  • B: CloudTrail は API 呼び出しを記録し、HTTP トラフィックは記録しません。
  • E: RDS ログはデータベース操作を記録し、HTTP ステータスコードは記録しません。

questions.content: An errant process is known to use an entire processor and run at 100%. A CloudOps engineer wants to automate restarting an Amazon EC2 instance when the problem occurs for more than 2 minutes. How can this be accomplished?

options.label: A
options.content: Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm for the EC2 instance with basic monitoring. Add an action to restart the instance.

options.label: B
options.content: Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm for the EC2 instance with detailed monitoring. Add an action to restart the instance.

options.label: C
options.content: Create an AWS Lambda function to restart the EC2 instance, invoked on a scheduled basis every 2 minutes.

options.label: D
options.content: Create an AWS Lambda function to restart the EC2 instance, invoked by EC2 health checks.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B：详细监控（1 分钟间隔）允许创建 2 分钟持续时间的警报。基本监控（5 分钟间隔）无法检测 2 分钟的条件。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 基本监控的 5 分钟间隔无法检测 2 分钟的 CPU 峰值。
  • C: 每 2 分钟检查一次可能会错过实际的 CPU 峰值时间。
  • D: EC2 健康检查不检测 CPU 使用率。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B：详细监控（1 分钟间隔）允许创建 2 分钟持续时间的警报。基本监控（5 分钟间隔）无法检测 2 分钟的条件。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 基本监控的 5 分钟间隔无法检测 2 分钟的 CPU 峰值。
  • C: 每 2 分钟检查一次可能会错过实际的 CPU 峰值时间。
  • D: EC2 健康检查不检测 CPU 使用率。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B: Detailed monitoring (1-minute interval) allows creating alarms for 2-minute duration conditions. Basic monitoring (5-minute interval) cannot detect 2-minute conditions.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Basic monitoring's 5-minute interval cannot detect 2-minute CPU spikes.
  • C: Checking every 2 minutes may miss actual CPU spike timing.
  • D: EC2 health checks don't detect CPU utilization.
explanations.ja:
正解 B：詳細モニタリング（1 分間隔）では、2 分間の条件のアラームを作成できます。基本モニタリング（5 分間隔）では 2 分間の条件を検出できません。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: 基本モニタリングの 5 分間隔では、2 分間の CPU スパイクを検出できません。
  • C: 2 分ごとにチェックすると、実際の CPU スパイクのタイミングを見逃す可能性があります。
  • D: EC2 ヘルスチェックは CPU 使用率を検出しません。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer wants to provide access to AWS services by attaching an IAM policy to multiple IAM users The CloudOps engineer also wants to be able to change the policy and create new versions. Which combination of actions will meet these requirements? (Choose two.)

options.label: A
options.content: Add the users to an IAM service-linked role. Attach the policy to the role.

options.label: B
options.content: Add the users to an IAM user group. Attach the policy to the group.

options.label: C
options.content: Create an AWS managed policy.

options.label: D
options.content: Create a customer managed policy.

options.label: E
options.content: Create an inline policy.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B 和 D：将用户添加到 IAM 用户组可以集中管理策略，客户托管策略支持版本控制和跨多个实体共享。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 服务链接角色由 AWS 服务创建和管理，不能用于用户访问。
  • C: AWS 托管策略不能被修改或版本化。
  • E: 内联策略不能跨多个实体共享。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B 和 D：将用户添加到 IAM 用户组可以集中管理策略，客户托管策略支持版本控制和跨多个实体共享。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 服务链接角色由 AWS 服务创建和管理，不能用于用户访问。
  • C: AWS 托管策略不能被修改或版本化。
  • E: 内联策略不能跨多个实体共享。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B and D: Adding users to IAM user groups allows centralized policy management, and customer managed policies support versioning and sharing across multiple entities.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Service-linked roles are created and managed by AWS services and cannot be used for user access.
  • C: AWS managed policies cannot be modified or versioned.
  • E: Inline policies cannot be shared across multiple entities.
explanations.ja:
正解 B と D：ユーザーを IAM ユーザーグループに追加すると、ポリシーを一元管理でき、カスタマー管理ポリシーはバージョニングと複数のエンティティ間での共有をサポートします。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: サービスリンクロールは AWS サービスによって作成および管理され、ユーザーアクセスには使用できません。
  • C: AWS 管理ポリシーは変更またはバージョン管理できません。
  • E: インラインポリシーは複数のエンティティ間で共有できません。

questions.content: A company runs an application on Amazon EC2 instances that are in an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group. Scale-out actions take a long time to become complete because of long-running boot scripts. A CloudOps engineer must implement a solution to reduce the required time for scale-out actions without overprovisioning the Auto Scaling group. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content: Change the launch configuration to use a larger instance size.

options.label: B
options.content: Increase the minimum number of instances in the Auto Scaling group.

options.label: C
options.content: Add a predictive scaling policy to the Auto Scaling group.

options.label: D
options.content: Add a warm pool to the Auto Scaling group.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 D：Warm Pool 预先启动实例并保持在停止状态，当需要扩展时可以快速启动，避免长时间的引导脚本等待。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 更大的实例不能减少引导脚本时间。
  • B: 增加最小实例数会导致过度配置。
  • C: 预测扩展基于历史模式，不能解决引导时间问题。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 D：Warm Pool 预先启动实例并保持在停止状态，当需要扩展时可以快速启动，避免长时间的引导脚本等待。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 更大的实例不能减少引导脚本时间。
  • B: 增加最小实例数会导致过度配置。
  • C: 预测扩展基于历史模式，不能解决引导时间问题。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer D: Warm Pool pre-launches instances and keeps them in a stopped state. When scaling is needed, they can be started quickly, avoiding long bootstrap script waits.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Larger instances cannot reduce bootstrap script time.
  • B: Increasing minimum instances causes over-provisioning.
  • C: Predictive scaling is based on historical patterns and cannot solve bootstrap time issues.
explanations.ja:
正解 D：Warm Pool はインスタンスを事前に起動し、停止状態で保持します。スケーリングが必要な場合、すぐに起動でき、長いブートストラップスクリプトの待機を回避できます。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: より大きなインスタンスはブートストラップスクリプトの時間を短縮できません。
  • B: 最小インスタンス数を増やすと過剰プロビジョニングになります。
  • C: 予測スケーリングは履歴パターンに基づいており、ブートストラップ時間の問題を解決できません。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer creates a new VPC that includes a public subnet and a private subnet. The CloudOps engineer successfully launches 11 Amazon EC2 instances in the private subnet The CloudOps engineer attempts to launch one more EC2 instance in the same subnet. However, the CloudOps engineer receives an error message that states that not enough free IP addresses are available. What must the CloudOps engineer do to deploy more EC2 instances?

options.label: A
options.content: Edit the private subnet to change the CIDR block to /27.

options.label: B
options.content: Edit the private subnet to extend across a second Availability Zone.

options.label: C
options.content: Assign additional Elastic IP addresses to the private subnet.

options.label: D
options.content: Create a new private subnet to hold the required EC2 instances.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 D：子网 CIDR 块创建后不能修改。要部署更多实例，需要创建一个新的子网。11 个实例说明当前子网可能使用了 /28 CIDR（16 个 IP，AWS 保留 5 个）。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 子网 CIDR 不能被编辑或扩展。
  • B: 子网不能跨可用区。
  • C: 弹性 IP 与私有子网可用 IP 数量无关。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 D：子网 CIDR 块创建后不能修改。要部署更多实例，需要创建一个新的子网。11 个实例说明当前子网可能使用了 /28 CIDR（16 个 IP，AWS 保留 5 个）。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: 子网 CIDR 不能被编辑或扩展。
  • B: 子网不能跨可用区。
  • C: 弹性 IP 与私有子网可用 IP 数量无关。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer D: Subnet CIDR blocks cannot be modified after creation. To deploy more instances, you need to create a new subnet. 11 instances suggests the current subnet may use a /28 CIDR (16 IPs, AWS reserves 5).

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: Subnet CIDR cannot be edited or expanded.
  • B: Subnets cannot span availability zones.
  • C: Elastic IPs are unrelated to private subnet available IP count.
explanations.ja:
正解 D：サブネット CIDR ブロックは作成後に変更できません。より多くのインスタンスをデプロイするには、新しいサブネットを作成する必要があります。11 個のインスタンスは、現在のサブネットが /28 CIDR（16 IP、AWS が 5 つ予約）を使用している可能性を示唆しています。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: サブネット CIDR は編集または拡張できません。
  • B: サブネットはアベイラビリティゾーンにまたがることができません。
  • C: Elastic IP はプライベートサブネットの使用可能な IP 数とは関係ありません。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer needs to build an event infrastructure for a set of custom application-specific events. The events must be sent to an AWS Lambda function for processing. The CloudOps engineer must record the events to replay later by event type or event time. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.label: A
options.content:
Create an Amazon EventBridge custom event bus. Create an archive on the custom event bus. Create a rule to send the
custom events to the Lambda function.

options.label: B
options.content:
Create an archive on the Amazon EventBridge default event bus. Use pattern matching to record the custom events. Create
a rule to send the custom events to the Lambda function.

options.label: C
options.content:
Create an archive on the Amazon EventBridge default event bus. Create an EventBridge pipe to ingest the custom events
and to save the custom events in the archive. Create a rule to send the custom events to the Lambda function.

options.label: D
options.content:
Create a log group in Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Create an Amazon EventBridge rule to send the custom events to the
Lambda function and to the log group.

questions.explanation:
正确答案 A：自定义事件总线用于应用特定事件，存档功能可以记录事件以便稍后按类型或时间重放。规则将事件发送到 Lambda 处理。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 默认事件总线用于 AWS 服务事件，不适合自定义应用事件。
  • C: EventBridge Pipes 不用于存档事件。
  • D: CloudWatch Logs 不支持按事件类型或时间重放事件。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 A：自定义事件总线用于应用特定事件，存档功能可以记录事件以便稍后按类型或时间重放。规则将事件发送到 Lambda 处理。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • B: 默认事件总线用于 AWS 服务事件，不适合自定义应用事件。
  • C: EventBridge Pipes 不用于存档事件。
  • D: CloudWatch Logs 不支持按事件类型或时间重放事件。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer A: Custom event bus is for application-specific events. Archive feature can record events for later replay by type or time. Rules send events to Lambda for processing.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • B: Default event bus is for AWS service events, not suitable for custom application events.
  • C: EventBridge Pipes is not for archiving events.
  • D: CloudWatch Logs doesn't support replaying events by type or time.
explanations.ja:
正解 A：カスタムイベントバスはアプリケーション固有のイベント用です。アーカイブ機能は、タイプまたは時間で後で再生するためにイベントを記録できます。ルールは処理のためにイベントを Lambda に送信します。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • B: デフォルトのイベントバスは AWS サービスイベント用であり、カスタムアプリケーションイベントには適していません。
  • C: EventBridge Pipes はイベントのアーカイブ用ではありません。
  • D: CloudWatch Logs はタイプまたは時間でイベントを再生することをサポートしていません。

questions.content: A CloudOps engineer has an AWS CloudFormation template of the company's existing infrastructure in us-west-2. The CloudOps engineer attempts to use the template to launch a new stack in eu-west-1, but the stack only partially deploys, receives an error message, and then rolls back. Why would this template fail to deploy? (Choose two.)

options.label: A
options.content: The template referenced an IAM user that is not available in eu-west-1.

options.label: B
options.content: The template referenced an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is not available in eu-west-1.

options.label: C
options.content: The template did not have the proper level of permissions to deploy the resources.

options.label: D
options.content: The template requested services that do not exist in eu-west-1.

options.label: E
options.content: CloudFormation templates can be used only to update existing services

questions.explanation:
正确答案 B 和 D：CloudFormation 模板跨区域部署失败的常见原因：AMI ID 是区域特定的，不能跨区域使用；某些 AWS 服务可能在某些区域不可用。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: IAM 用户是全局资源，在所有区域可用。
  • C: 权限问题会在部署开始时就失败，不会部分部署。
  • E: CloudFormation 模板可以用于创建新堆栈。

explanations.zh:
正确答案 B 和 D：CloudFormation 模板跨区域部署失败的常见原因：AMI ID 是区域特定的，不能跨区域使用；某些 AWS 服务可能在某些区域不可用。

为什么其他选项错误：

  • A: IAM 用户是全局资源，在所有区域可用。
  • C: 权限问题会在部署开始时就失败，不会部分部署。
  • E: CloudFormation 模板可以用于创建新堆栈。
explanations.en:
Correct Answer B and D: Common reasons CloudFormation templates fail across regions: AMI IDs are region-specific and cannot be used across regions; some AWS services may not be available in certain regions.

Why other options are incorrect:

  • A: IAM users are global resources and available in all regions.
  • C: Permission issues would cause failure at deployment start, not partial deployment.
  • E: CloudFormation templates can be used to create new stacks.
explanations.ja:
正解 B と D：CloudFormation テンプレートがリージョン間で失敗する一般的な理由：AMI ID はリージョン固有であり、リージョン間で使用できません。一部の AWS サービスは特定のリージョンで利用できない場合があります。

他のオプションが不正解な理由：

  • A: IAM ユーザーはグローバルリソースであり、すべてのリージョンで利用可能です。
  • C: 権限の問題はデプロイ開始時に失敗を引き起こし、部分的なデプロイではありません。
  • E: CloudFormation テンプレートは新しいスタックを作成するために使用できます。
